course.subject: LIFS
course.name: Biomedical Sciences Research Project II
course.description: A research project which may be conducted either in the Division of Life Science or the Chemistry department under the supervision of a faculty member: design of experiments, analysis of data, submission of a written report and seminar or poster presentation. This course is for MBMS students only. Approval of the course instructor is needed for students to enroll in this course.
course.exclusions: CHEM 4688, LIFS 4980, LIFS 4981
